title: Second Public Stable Version Released!
changes:
NEW Refresh Lyrics Button 

-> The Lyrics can now be dynamically updated, by fetching the latest updated changes from GitHub Repo. 
-> Why this change? Cuz now, there's no need to update the app each time some lyrics are corrected.
NEW Time Metric Filter Option
Simplify Categories List Labels
Improve UI Layout
Added a Top Nav Icon to Navigate to the Top.
For more info on changes, visit https://github.com/Reynold29/CSI-Hymns-and-Lyrics/commits/main/

title: Public Stable Version Released!
changes: Included All Hymns and Keerthane.
Built-In Favorites Button.
Filter Button Added with options to Order Hymns by Number, Alphabetical Order and Signatures.
Included Button to Report Wrong Lyrics.
Fixed UI Overflow Issues, enhancing smaller phones user experience
Improve Search Bar Operations. ( Now you can search using Signatures Too!! )
For more info on changes, visit https://github.com/Reynold29/CSI-Hymns-and-Lyrics/commits/main/
